source:
Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

# #Create DataFrame for the publicdriverpayitem TMS Table
# publicdriverpayitem = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/TMS/publicdriverpayitem.parquet', format='parquet')
# publicdriverpayitem.createOrReplaceTempView("publicdriverpayitem")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stdriverpayitem
AS
SELECT

    d.id as tms_driverpayitem_id
    ,d.driverid as tms_driverpayitem_driverid
    ,d.tripid as tms_driverpayitem_tripid
    ,d.triprate as tms_driverpayitem_triprate
    ,d.mealrate as tms_driverpayitem_mealrate
    ,d.sleepoverrate as tms_driverpayitem_sleepoverrate
    ,d.airtimerate as tms_driverpayitem_airtimerate
    ,d.linkrate as tms_driverpayitem_linkrate
    ,d.totalrate as tms_driverpayitem_totalrate
    ,d.routeid as tms_driverpayitem_routeid
    ,d.routename as tms_driverpayitem_routename
    ,to_timestamp(d.insdate) as tms_driverpayitem_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.moddate) as tms_driverpayitem_moddate
    ,d.horse as tms_driverpayitem_horse
    ,d.trailers as tms_driverpayitem_trailers
    ,d.linkused as tms_driverpayitem_linkused
    ,d.manualadjustment as tms_driverpayitem_manualadjustment
    ,d.editby as tms_driverpayitem_editby
    ,d.drivername as tms_driverpayitem_drivername
    ,to_timestamp(d.dispatchdate) as tms_driverpayitem_dispatchdate
    ,d.bookings as tms_driverpayitem_bookings
    ,d.employeecode as tms_driverpayitem_employeecode
    ,d.originatedfrom as tms_driverpayitem_originatedfrom
    ,d.reportid as tms_driverpayitem_reportid

FROM publicdriverpayitem d
